label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_009
content:

### Events
- Opened an audit exception for one privileged role grant missing security co-approval; requested retroactive approval or revoke.
- Adjusted RBAC policy text for clarity (no permission change) and stored new version hash in evidence repository.
- Reviewed token rotation failures; 9 tied to one internal client using deprecated endpoint; filed migration ticket.
- Performed spot-check of directory deletions vs HR terminations; all 7 matched.
